paragraphs.first: As a frontend developer, programming is one of my greatest passions. Already during my studies in Denmark I was involved in some projects or implemented them in a leading role. Both the technical and the creative implementation of the projects motivate me in my work. Also in my spare time I am constantly educating myself in this field, creating my own projects or taking part in digital training courses.
paragraphs.second: My skills are mainly in HTML, CSS, Javascript/Typescript and different web frameworks where I have the most experience with React.js.
paragraphs.third: I am also familiar with advanced CSS concepts such as the box model or selector specificity, as well as creating modern layouts with grid and flexbox.
paragraphs.fourth: Especially in the field of web development there are constant changes and innovations. The familiarization with new technologies gives me joy and motivates me in my work. I consider challenges as the basis of valuable experience for my future work, which I would like to meet with efficiency and innovation.

projectssection.sentenceguesser: Sentence Guesser works by taking an English sentence that you provide, translating it to German with DeepL, then returning it to you in the form of a fill-in-the-blanks exercise.
projectssection.guitarnotefinder: Another tool made for learning the fretboard of a guitar
projectssection.sortingvis: Tool I made as a part of a school exercise to visualize sorting algorithms. Supports Insertion Sort, Selection Sort and Bubble Sort
projectssection.fretworkout: Tool I made to help myself learn all the notes on a guitar's fretboard
projectssection.aleye: Website I helped making for the startup company Al-eye. The company is developing visual aids using augmented reality
projectssection.rockpaper: Game I made as part of a Frontendmentors.io challenge
projectssection.quiz: Quiz I made for Universit√§t Erfurt as a part of International Developmental Language Disorder Awareness Day
projectssection.portolio: The website you're on. Designed in Figma and made from the bottom up using GSAP for the animations.
